text: The 2010 Primera B de Chile was second tier’s 60th season. Deportes Iquique was the tournament’s champion, winning its third title. ==Aggregated table== ==Promotion Playoffs== ==Top goalscorers== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Rank ! Name ! Club !
